summary: Integration test suite for the TensorFlow Retrievalâ€‘Augmented Generation (RAG) model that verifies model initialization, loading of pretrained weights, generation in both sequence and token modes, batch processing, inference behavior, checkpoint handling, and model persistence.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the TensorFlow RAG implementation before deployment, ensuring it can be instantiated, generate responses, handle large batches, work with specific checkpoints, and be saved and reloaded reliably in production environments.
